title: Cotton weaving a better future together

tasks.task: Attend World Cotton Day celebrations and foster sustainable cotton farming practices.
subtasks: Celebrate World Cotton Day by participating in events and activities.
Renew commitment to sustainably farming cotton and achieving 2030 SDGs.
Support smallholders, women, and young people in the cotton supply chain.
Promote innovative technology and sustainable farming practices in cotton cultivation.
Boost employment opportunities and add value to cotton products.
Reduce the impact of climate change on cotton farming through eco-friendly practices.

tasks.task: Operate and grow a textile business involving cotton products.
subtasks: Run a textile business focusing on producing apparel and other cotton items.
Utilize various parts of the cotton plant for different products (e.g., food, feed, energy).
Create job opportunities for millions in the cotton supply chain.
Strive for competitiveness in the cotton industry through ecosystem support and innovation.

tasks.task: Plan and execute a business strategy for Red Team Plains.
subtasks: Define the business objectives and approach for Red Team Plains.
Develop a plan to build a business focused on Free Chinamaya IO.
Explore market opportunities and competitive strategies for the new business.
